name: validation
tips_restart:
On validation, the device has to restart some application.
The operation can take a minute.
tips_reboot:
On validation, the device has to restart himself.
The operation can take up to five minutes.
tips_please_wait: Please wait, you will be automatically redirected when your device will be ready.

validate_reboot:

validate_redirect: You will be redirected as soon as possible.
